title: Imagine That
description: What if the impossible were to be possible? Unicorns, Zombies and, gulp, love? Athena Jackson finds her world turned upside down when she is abducted by aliens. Thrown into insane situations with the best of people, Athena will have to learn that she has to fight for what she wants in life. A story of a girl that was made for something more than the life she had settled for.
author: Aimee Penn
